Socketserver¶

class socketserver.WSHandler(*args)[source]¶

Websocket server that uses the Tornado websocket handler. Please run pip install tornado with python of version 2.7.9 or greater to install tornado.

on_close()[source]¶

Method whith fires when connection is closed.

on_message(message)[source]¶

Accepting message from javasctipt client

class processor.MessageProcessor(*args)[source]¶

This class manages with income messages from javascript.

subscribe(room)[source]¶

Subscribing user to the channel in the REDIS server
